src:
Intuicija kot smerokaz
Vse odgovore poznate, samo poiskati jih je treba. Zabeležite jih, da boste lahko primerjali njihovo točnost.
05 Nov 2019, 20:06 by M. B. Z.
Vsi odgovori se skrivajo v vas, samo ustaviti se morate in se naučiti prisluhniti svoji intuiciji. Okrepite jo lahko tako, da jo večkrat preizkusite in spremljate, kako dobro vam je šlo. Sčasoma se bo vaš pretanjeni občutek o tem, kam vas usmerja notranje vodstvo, okrepil. Če ste pred pomembno odločitvijo, tehtate med dvema možnostma ali smerema ali se sprašujete, ali bi bilo smiselno uresničiti določeno idejo ali raje pozabiti nanjo, si predstavljajte velikanski termometer z desetimi enotami. Prosite svojo notranjo modrost, naj vam pove, kako dobra je posamezna ideja ali odločitev – na lestvici od ena do deset. Opazujte, kako se tekočina zvišuje v njem, dokler se naposled ne ustavi na pravi enoti. Zabeležite si rezultat za vsako posamezno idejo, da jih boste na koncu lahko primerjali, ko se bodo odvili konkretni dogodki, in preverili, kako prav je imela vaša intuicija.Vprašate se lahko, kateri novi projekti in podvigi so najboljši za vas. Vsako posebej si prikličite v misli, predstavljajte si, kako jo opravljate in občutite, in opazujte termometer. Katera ideja vas bo najbolj izpolnila? S katero bi bilo najbolje začeti? Katera bo dolgoročno prinesla najboljše rezultate?Preverite lahko tudi, katere tekoče projekte in ideje bi bilo bolje zaključiti. Morda, kateri odnosi vas izčrpavajo in vam škodijo in kateri so samo trenutno v krizi. Vsako stvar si predstavljajte in preverite termometer. Katera je najbolj v nasprotju z vašim namenom? Katero bi bilo prav opustiti? Kaj morate storiti? Opazujte in s tem krepite svojo intuicijo.
text:
Intuition as a signpost
You know all the answers, you just have to find them. Record them so you can compare their accuracy.
05 Nov 2019, 20:06 by M. B. Z.
All the answers are hiding in you, you just have to stop and learn to listen to your intuition. You can strengthen it by repeatedly trying it out and keeping track of how well you are doing. Over time, your subtle sense of where your inner leadership is heading will intensify. If you are ahead of an important decision, weighing between two options or directions, or wondering if it would make sense to implement a particular idea or rather forget it, imagine a giant ten-unit thermometer. Ask your inner wisdom to tell you how good each idea or decision is - on a scale of one to ten. Watch the fluid rise in it until it finally stops at the right unit. Make a note of the result for each idea so that you can eventually compare them as specific events unfold and see how your intuition was right. You may ask yourself which new projects and ventures are best for you. Invoke your thoughts individually, imagine how you perform and feel it, and observe a thermometer. Which idea will fulfill you most? Which one would be best to start with? Which will produce the best results in the long run? You can also check which ongoing projects and ideas might be better to complete. Maybe which relationships are exhausting and damaging you and which ones are just in crisis right now. Imagine every thing and check a thermometer. Which is most contrary to your purpose? Which would be right to abandon? What should you do? Observe and thus enhance your intuition.
